songs.title: Boredom
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Matthew Bellamy]
We should be in the summer spirit
But it might as well be rain
We should be having such a good time
But I'm so bored it's causing me pain

[Pre-Chorus: Matthew Bellamy]
My dear
This love is dead
Somehow, someway
You'll come away
With you it's dead

[Chorus: Matthew Bellamy and Chris Wholstenholme]
I can't let you pretend
These days
(These days)
Are the best you've had
Doesn't matter cause I love you

[Verse 2: Matthew Bellamy]
Stop telling me to try and cheer up
I just don't wanna be here
We should be having such a good time
But you're no good
No, you are going blind

[Pre-Chorus: Matthew Bellamy]
My dear
This love is dead
There's no way
You'll come away
With you it's dead

[Chorus: Matthew Bellamy and Chris Wholstenholme]
I can't let you pretend
These days
(These days)
Are the best you've had

[Outro: Matthew Bellamy]
My dear, this love is dead
Somehow, someway
You'll come away
